name: Solitaire (itch) (Luciano)
description:
Install instructions

Thank you for downloading our game!

You can look at our work, commits and the source files at: https://github.com/lucianodonati/GMTK-GameJam2020.git

Try to gather as much information as you can and discover where and why are you there. 

It might be a good idea to play with a notepad.
